name: Peninsula Humane Society & SPCA Donations
description: Accepts donations of pet supplies, animal care items, and usable household goods for resale; proceeds support animal rescue and adoption programs
fullDescription: Peninsula Humane Society & SPCA accepts donations of pet supplies and household goods to support their animal rescue, care, and adoption programs in San Mateo County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept pet supply donations
- Accept animal care items
- Accept household goods for resale
- Proceeds support animal rescue
- Support adoption programs
- Items help sheltered animals
howToGetIt:
1. Check donation wish list
2. Gather pet supplies or goods
3. Drop off at shelter location
4. Or visit thrift store
5. Support animal welfare
6. Consider adopting a pet
keywords: Peninsula Humane Society, SPCA, PHS, pet supplies donation, animal shelter, Burlingame, animal rescue, adopt pet, donation center
